item.title: Spawning Rights-ONLY 1 ERROR
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

Goddamn are you all fucking retards?

if (command.startsWith("pickup")) {
    try {
        int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 11));
        int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));

        if(newItemID == 35 && playerRights < 2) {
                sM("You're not a fucking admin.");
                return;
        }

        if (newItemID >= 0) {
            addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
        } else {
            sendMessage("No such item.");
        }
    } catch (Exception e) {
        sendMessage("Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup 0995 10");
    }
}
if (command.startsWith("item")) {
    try {
        int newitem = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(5));

        if(newItem == 35) {
            sM("You're not a fucking admin");
            return;
        }
        if (newitem >= 0) {
            createItem(newitem);
        } else {
             sendMessage("No such item");
        }
    } catch (Exception e) {
        sendMessage("Bad item ID");
    }
}

NOTE: These commands make ONLY admins can spawn item ID 35 but ANYONE can use the commands to pickup ANY other item.

Read full topic

if (command.startsWith("pickup") && (playerRights >= 2)) { try { int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12)); int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13)); 
            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
            if (newItemID == 35 && playerRights >= 3) {
              sendMessage("SPAWNED ITEM");
        } else {
       sendMessage("Fail...Owners can spawn this only");
